html:
2025-0640
2025-09-02PMOParliament of Canada ActAppointment of the Parliamentary Budget Officer, on an interim basisAppointment of Jason Jacques of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Parliamentary Budget Officer, during good behaviour on an interim basis, to hold office for a term of six months, effective September 3, 2025.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Parliamentary Budget Officer, on an interim basis
precis: Appointment of Jason Jacques of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Parliamentary Budget Officer, during good behaviour on an interim basis, to hold office for a term of six months, effective September 3, 2025.
